Strong points 
Good team working smart working, good communication, open minded and highly responsible to 
achieve objectives/goals effectively. Very keen to learn new technologies and new business domains/markets. I work well with 
or without supervision.

Duties: Senior Software Engineer. 
 
Develop and maintain backend services of Ciiva team. 
 
In charge of the integration of Ciiva Api, a center API gateway that is used by multiple external 
programs, with million users access. 
Main Technologies: C# (.Net 4.5 and Core), Go, Service Stack, Elastic Search, RabbitMQ. WebSockets. 
PowerShell 
Project involved:  
1/ Ciiva website: www.ciiva.com  
- 
Support to search millions of electronic components from Ciiva and Octopart’s parts database. 
- 
Provide historical lifecycle data, pricing, and availability for every Ciiva part. 
2/ Ciiva Api Gateway. 
- 
Expose API endpoint that access Ciiva products such as: SmartParts, BOM Management. 
- 
Keep component libraries standardized and organized. 
- 
Quickly access electronic components from multiple largest distributors in the world. 
-

NetBlue – Flipside LLC 
Duties: Developer 
 
Develop and enhance domain parking product that serviced 
 
Web Programming with C#/ASP.NET and tools. 
 
Involving in SCRUM team working process in making projects 
Project involved:   
 
Search Retrieval Service: Used abstract factory pattern to manage calls to various provider 
advertising feeds, provide testability, and allow for custom implementations for use by various 
applications 
 
Cache generator service: Central caching service which synchronize cache files on all web servers. 
Web servers then use data as local cache files, don’t need to make any expensive calls to elsewhere. 
 
Log parser service: Service which monitors and collects all user actions from all web servers and 
doing bulk import to database. This information is analyzed and used for optimization user 
experience, monetization as well as crosscheck with partners. 
 
Optimization service: Service which helps optimize user experiences and monetization. It bases on 
user activities and revenue generated, then suggests different optimized behavior next: should show 
feed on our page or forward traffic to partners, which template (in over 2k templates in system) 
should be shown, which feed partners is best to show. 
 
Develop CI projects using CruiseControl.NET 
 
Technologies and Tools ASP.NET MVC, Web API, WCF .NET 4.0, AngualarJS, SignalR, 
NHibernate, Entity Framework, Bootstrap, Git, SVN
